After ABC gave the series an abbreviated renewal last May for its seventh and final season, Goodman said he’ll “be grateful for a long time” that the network gave them the “courtesy” of allowing them to finish the show. The Conners premiered as a spin-off in October 2018, focusing on the eponymous family in the wake of Roseanne’s death from an opioid overdose. With the two-part series finale of The Conners airing Wednesday at 8/7c on ABC, the Emmy winner said the seven-season revival has gone by “so fast” as he opened up about bidding farewell to the patriarchal character he originated on Roseanne in 1988.
